name: Marbles
overview: Published in Compute! Magazine from issue 089 in October 1987. Act quickly—and don't panic—in this clever arcade-style game. In two weeks the Statewide Marbles Championship will be held in Louisville.. You've been practicing for nearly a year, and now, at the last minute, you find you've lost your favorite marble. You're going to have to collect every marble you can to find one as special as the one you lost. "Marbles" is a hypnotic arcade style game in which you try to catch marbles in a bucket.
